trends: There has been one other sighting in Youngstown
There were no other sightings in Youngstown on or around November 22nd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was letting dog out seen this bright star and thought I would see it thru binoculars when I looked at it with them it was a ball of energy flashing like a tesla electric ball stayed in one place for long time when I came back out was gone have not seen it since what did I see has anyone else seen this . Looks like a star unless you use binoculars.I feel like I seen something but what looked transparent but electric pulsating lines inside. I thought it was just a star but it is something else. I feel like since I am near an air force base maybe it was there's do you know? I am freaking out it had no sound , and if I hadn't got the binoculars would not have seen it.
Summary: was a ball of energy with flashing lights like a tesla ball inside pink blue
